resources.string: Your device could not be activated. Retry.
You can now interact with locks, directly with your phone.
Please allow location in Settings -> Permissions
You need to allow the app to access this device\'s location.
Please turn on the location services to use the Digital Key
It seems like you need to re-activate your Digital Key. It will just take a few seconds then you can keep using it.
Digital Key received by the lock.
Bluetooth is required to use your Digital Key. Please turn it on.
Looking for your lock. Remember to tap on it to wake it up.
Please double-check your access code and your OpenId configuration values (strings.xml file)
Please verify you have added the right OpenId configuration values for this client in your strings.xml file
Apri l\'app e tocca il pulsante Digital Key.
Please reset your Digital Key from the settings in the app.
To use the widget, please allow location permission at all times for the app.
Digital Key is activeâ€¦Tap the reader of the lock with this phone.
The app uses location data to enable the Digital Key Widget even when the app is closed or not in use.\nWe don\'t store your location data.
